text: wow
fairy tales
[Music]
once upon a time in a small kingdom
there lived a clever and handsome prince
named roger
he deeply fell in love with the princess
of a neighbor kingdom named eliza
who was famous for her beauty throughout
all the land
in the garden outside his palace there
was a wonderful rose tree
it bloomed only once in five long years
and then it bore but a single flower
the fragrance of it would make a man
forget all of his sorrows
and his cares the prince had a
nightingale too
it sang as if all the sweet songs of the
world were in its little throat
the prince decided to bring the
nightingale and the rose
as gifts to propose to princess eliza
roger was standing in front of the gate
asking for permission to enter the
palace with his gifts
however the king wanted to see the
presents first
if they were really precious then he
would allow roger to enter the palace
roger had no choice but to give the
presence to the gatekeepers
and waited outside the palace
the gatekeeper brought a glass closure
with a rose inside to present the king
the nightingale was standing above the
glass cage
when the closure was opened there was a
splendid rose
its fragrance spread throughout the room
the maid of the princess exclaimed
so fragrant so pretty it's more than
pretty
it's superb
the king was really satisfied with this
gift
however he still frowned he thought that
the prince of a small kingdom would
never deserve his daughter
then he said this flower is really
beautiful
but it cannot last long it will be
withered after a few weeks
let's see the next present the
nightingale flew over
then it sang so sweetly that for a
little while
no one could think of a single thing to
say against it
superb charming unbelievable
how its voice can be perfect like that
its voice is so wonderful but it can fly
away anytime
servant tell the prince of the neighbor
king
to go back he can only come here to
propose when he has
more precious presence the princess
really loved these gifts she also wanted
to meet the prince
but she couldn't disobey her father's
command
we're really sorry prince but the king
required you to go back and find
more precious gifts for proposing to the
princess
yes i got it thank you the prince sadly
replied
then he turned and walked away
these are my most precious things what
can i do now
just give up like that suddenly
he came up with an idea he darkened his
face with mud
tore his clothes and returned to the
king's palace
in order to find the chance to approach
the princess
roger intended to apply to work in the
palace
we have enough servants however
i do need somebody to tend to the pigs
because we've got so many of them can
you do it
[Music]
the prince happily accepted the job he
said
i can do anything i just need a job
so roger was appointed imperial pig
tender he was given a wretched little
house down by the pigsties
and there he had to live in front of his
house
the soil was so barren that no plants
could survive
all living conditions were very
difficult
but they could not make him discouraged
[Music]
moreover he was often bullied and mocked
by the servants in the palace when he
was tending the pig
hey you pigtender you didn't even ask
anyone when you come here
what a useless man how can a young man
be a big tender
but roger just ignored what others said
he tried
to focus on his work
although roger was a prince he still
worked really hard
as time went by the pigs which he tended
were getting
fatter and fatter moreover
during his free time roger planted many
flowers and trees
and soon rogers living grounds became
more beautiful than ever even
more than the king's garden every
afternoon
when he finished the work of tending the
pigs and taking care of the garden
roger started to play his guitar his
melodious sounds
made the scene more peaceful than ever
and these voices finally drew the
princess's attention
she asked the maids guys
where did that sound come from yes
princess
that sound comes from the guitar of the
swineherd
that's great i have to go there to see
the next day the princess and her maids
went to see roger's house
everyone was really overwhelmed by the
wonderful garden that roger had taken
care of
it's wonderful i have never seen such
that romantic and charming garden before
who took care of it your highness
i had taken care of this garden in my
spare time
it is really elaborate and what about
the melodious guitar voice i can hear
every evening
is that yours too yes
it is mine i'm sorry for disturbing you
your highness
[Music]
no it is very good i always want to live
in harmony with nature
surrounded by trees and music can i come
here more often
it is my honor your highness
since then the princess went to roger's
house to see the flowers
and listen to the guitar every day the
two young people became closer
they talked to each other about many
things in life
they gradually fell in love with each
other as time went by
then one day this information reached
the ears of the kings from a flatterer
your majesty recently the princess has
been coming to the pigtender's place
every day from
early morning to late at night
she has probably been charmed by that
swine herd
the king listened to the story he was
really angry
and ordered the princess to go there and
meet him
father what's going on
yes i heard that recently you have
always been at the swineherd's place
right
yes there is a beautiful garden there
the
pigtender also plays guitar very well
so i often go there you
are a princess this place is not
suitable for your status
from now on you are not allowed to go
there
anymore and i will not allow that
swineherd
to stay here father
you can't do that no more talking
you can go home now and that very day
the king kicked roger out of his palace
he even ordered the soldier to destroy
the garden that roger had taken care of
elaborately
in spite of the king's ban princess
eliza still went to the place where
roger used to live
planting trees and flowers to restore
the garden
but no matter how hard she tried the
garden was still not as green as before
gradually the princess became ill but
she still tried to take care of the
garden
until one day the princess was so tired
and desperate
she burst into tears and fainted
when she woke up she found herself in
roger's house
and he was sitting there worriedly
looking at her
she was really surprised quickly asked
roger is that you am i dreaming
it is me you are not dreaming eliza was
really touched
hugging roger tightly how could you be
here
haven't you been kicked out of the
palace already
roger told the princess everything after
being kicked out of the palace
i was really desperate i didn't want to
leave you
luckily with my gardening skill i
disguised myself and was accepted as the
gardener of the palace
[Music]
i still watched you every day when you
were sick
it was really hurtful to me until today
when i saw you exhausted and fainted i
could not stand it anymore
the princess looked at roger emotionally
for a long moment
then she said roger i don't know what to
do
i always want to become a dutiful
daughter i have never disobeyed the
father's words
but my life has never been all right
let's go eliza let's go ask the king
for me to marry you i don't believe that
he doesn't care
about your happiness the king was really
upset
to see his daughter had suddenly become
sick like that
but he did not know what to do while
thinking
the king suddenly saw roger and eliza
were coming
the swine heard didn't i kick you out of
my palace
your majesty i'm actually the prince of
your neighbor kingdom
i was not allowed to enter your palace
to meet you and eliza
so i decided to disguise myself as a pig
tender
to have the opportunity to approach the
princess
after being kicked out i once again
disguised myself as the palace gardener
eliza and i really love each other i
hope that you will allow us to get
married
father since i was born i've always
obeyed all of your orders
but i've never felt comfortable with my
life only when i'm with roger i can be
truly happy
and be myself may your majesty yoke us
together
when the king saw his daughter smiling
again
with no signs of illness he suddenly
realized
that because he was so strict that he
accidentally made his daughter lose her
true happiness
he was also really touched by roger's
perseverance
and sincere love for his daughter i'm
sorry dear eliza
i just wanted you to marry the one who
deserved you
most but maybe i was too strict
and roger i can feel your true
love with my daughter i agree to marry
her to you
after that the beautiful princess
followed roger to go back to his palace
the wedding between the two of them took
place at rogers palace
with the blessings of everyone since
then
they lived happily ever after
fairy tales
once upon a time in a kingdom there were
three princes
the oldest was vincent and the second
oldest was
hubert and the youngest prince was
carbon
[Music]
prince vincent and prince hilbert were
not at the palace frequently
because they liked traveling and
adventuring
therefore only the youngest prince lived
with the king
to take care of him one day the king
became sick
and he really wanted to see his two
oldest sons
karwyn asked the servants to look after
the king
and then set off to find and ask his
brothers to go home
he traveled for a long time too many
roads
and many mountains but he still couldn't
find his brothers
[Music]
when walking through a forest garven
finally spotted prince vincent
and prince hobart from afar
he was very happy and waved to them but
the two princes did not pay attention to
him
because they were riding their horses
quickly in the opposite direction
run come to coron there is a wild beast
because he was too happy to find his
brothers
carving did not know there was a big
lion chasing them
he quickly turned around and ran after
his two brothers
the three princes birthed their horses
and rode
deep into the forest they kept
running until they did not hear the lion
chasing them anymore
at that time they realized that they
were lost in the forest
and did not know the way out i think we
are lost
we've never been in this place before
hey brother
why are you here father is sick and he
wants to see you we must quickly find a
way home
let me help you find a way out of this
forest
hearing cowan say that made prince
vincent and prince hubert
laugh a lot
you you're just a fool
come on follow us we will protect you
yes it's true wise people like us still
struggle
you're just our burden i'm not a fool
the two princes didn't care about what
carbon said
and just left first carve inside
helplessly and rode his horse after them
together they tried to find their way
back to the palace
on the way the princess suddenly
encountered
a large anthill oh what a huge anthem
why don't we try to destroy the ant hill
to see how they carry their eggs
yeah brother i've never seen such a big
anthill
carving birthday conversation so he
immediately tried to prevent it
please leave them alone if you destroy
the ant hill
it will take months for them to build a
new one
after listening to carvin the two
brothers skipped the ant hell
they continued on their journey they
went to a lake full
of swimming ducks many ducks are
swimming
it's almost dark now how about we grill
a duck for dinner
good idea i'm hungry too
please don't eat them i brought some
bread
if you're hungry just eat my bread
carven gave each prince a piece of bread
having the bread to eat the two brothers
did not kill
a duck all three kept going
finally they arrived at a big tree
on its trunk there was a huge bee hive
filled with honey it's a beehive full of
honey
eating bread with this honey would be
very good
yes i will look for some dry leaves to
burn the beehive
once again carven tried to prevent his
two brothers
leave them alone please they didn't do
anything to you
you always say let them be leave them
alone you are
so foolish and so feminine
the two older princess looked at each
other and
laughed corbin frowned unhappily but
he didn't say anything yet the two
princes
rode away the three princes continued on
their journey
they worried about not finding the way
home
but suddenly saw a green mossy castle in
front of them
the three brothers happily rode their
horses to the castle
however it was just an abandoned castle
surrounded by rocks
without a single person living inside
they decided to explore the castle
they walked along a very long hallway
and passed by all the rooms they finally
arrived
at a room whose door was closed there
were three keys hanging on the door
when they went to the back of the castle
they saw a small room
at the end of the hallway with a very
low entrance
on the door there was a home with a view
inside feeling curious hobart walked
towards the door
and peered inside he saw an old man
with gray hair sitting at the table
[Music]
prince hubert called him
[Music]
hello sir the man didn't respond
prince hubert called again
hey sir do you hear me
prince vincent lost his patience he
stepped closer
and called out
[Music]
hello sir we are guests from afar we are
lost here so we want to ask for
directions home
this time the old man heard him and
slowly stood up
he opened the door and walked out the
three princes were very happy
they asked for a way to get out of there
we got lost in this forest for a few
days and
still do not know the way home can you
show us the way to get out of here
in spite of the hopeful faces of the
three princess the tiny old man didn't
say a word and instead he led them
somewhere
all three princes were very confused but
nonetheless
followed the old man he led them to a
table
with a lot of food because they were
lost in the forest for a very long time
the three was starving all three
devoured the food on the table
after they finished the meal the little
old man led them to their personal
bedrooms
the next morning the old man came to
prince vincent's room
and waved to him he led prince vincent
to the back of the castle
where there was a huge
prince winston was very surprised to see
the words written on the rock
it said there were three things which
must be done
in order to save the whole castle
the first thing was under the moss in
the forest
there are a thousand gems owned by the
princess
you must find every single gem before
sunset if
all the gems are not found you will turn
into stone even if you're missing one
easy i will save this castle
prince vincent went into the forest
again to find the gems
however though he searched for the whole
day
he could only pick 100 gems before the
sun went down
because he didn't find all the gems
vincent instantly became a stone statue
[Music]
the next morning the little old man led
prince hoover to the rock
he was not much better than his elder
brother
he only found 200 gems
and turned into a statue as well carvin
got the last
chance he stood there looking at the
green moss
and thought about how he could find a
thousand gems
one thousand gems how can i find one
thousand gems in a day
[Music]
suddenly there was a queen aunt coming
to him and she told him
hey kind man i will help you find one
thousand
gems in a day
garwin was very confused and looked
around to find
where the voice came from then he saw a
queen ant in front of his foot
you rescued us in the past so now i just
want to repay you
carvin hadn't said anything yet but the
queen ant
ordered all the other ants to come
they were able to find all the 1000 gems
just in a flash and put them all in a
pile
now go to that pool and find the key to
open the princesses room
but be careful if you cannot solve the
puzzle
you will become a stone statue
second thing he had to do was to dive
deep into the pool to find the key to
the princess's bedroom
when prince garwin approached the pool
the flock of ducks that carvin had saved
earlier
went to him and said
hey kind man since you saved us
we will help you fire the key in the
steep pool
immediately the ducks dive together into
the deep pool
to find the key for prince carven
luckily one of them found the key and
brought it to the prince
[Music]
use this key to open the princesses room
but be
careful if you cannot solve the puzzle
you will become a stone statue carven
did the key and went to the princess's
room
when karwyn entered he saw three statues
of the three princesses
in the room the last thing he had to do
to save the castle
was to figure out who was the youngest
princess
all three princesses looked so young and
beautiful
so it was difficult for garvin to
distinguish
who was the youngest on the statues it
said
before going to bed the three princesses
ate
different sweets the older princess
ate a piece of sugar candy the second
oldest princess
drank strawberry syrup and the youngest
princess
ate a spoonful of honey how can i
distinguish among three girls
which princess ate the honey while he
was thinking
a queen bee flew to carbon
the bee immediately said
you're a kind man because you saved us
we will help you figure out which
princess ate the honey
after saying so the queen bee and two
other bees
flew towards the three princesses to
sniff each of their lips
finally the beast stopped at the last
statue
prince carvin moved to the princess and
took her hand
in the end the whole castle was
magically saved
and everything returned to normal
all human statues became humans again
the youngest princess was transformed
back into a human
happily taking prince carvin's hand
you've saved me and the castle
now i'm yours everyone was better than
normal
speaking happily with each other
the princesses happily spoke with the
three princess
after chatting the three princess said
goodbye to the princesses
and returned to their kingdom shortly
after prince carvin returned to propose
to the youngest princess
their wedding took place with the
blessing of the whole kingdom
the older princess felt that there were
still
a lot of things in the world that they
needed to learn
therefore they continued on their
travels and adventures
when their father passed away prince
corbin became
the king and ruled the kingdom
the whole kingdom lived peacefully and
happily
under the control of the kind-hearted
king
wow fairy tales
[Music]
once upon a time there lived the king
and his wife who ruled the mezzaland
kingdom in peace and prosperity
the queen was pregnant and both of them
were expecting their little angel to be
born
that was a boy named logan however
he had an extra big and long nose which
covered half of his face
what's going on why did this happen to
our kid
[Music]
that was because three years ago when
the king had just been crowned
he fell in love with the queen who was
still a beautiful princess at that time
she lived in an old castle thanks to the
support of an old fairy
the king knew that the princess had been
hexed and detained in this castle by a
witch
the witch cast a spell to conjure a big
snake
which watched the princess day and night
to save her you should enter the castle
when the snake is sleeping
if you are able to kill it the princess
will be free
that night the young king snuck into the
bedroom of the princess
where a big snake was rolling in sound
asleep
however the princess was really worried
for him
the young king swung the sword at the
snake it immediately vanished into dust
the young king happily held the hand of
the princess
he said get out of here with me
the princess happily accepted
they escaped the castle together
however while they were on the run
everything was detected by the witch
the princess was too scared she screamed
out loud and fainted
how dare you harm my beloved snake
i curse your child he will have to bring
a long and big
nose and he will never know what his
happiness
[Music]
back at the palace the young king was so
worried
however because of the happiness he was
having with the princess
he quickly forgot all the threats of the
witch
then they celebrated their wedding
the queen listened to the full story of
the king
then they discussed to find out the best
way to help their kid have a happy life
we will never say that logan's big nose
is ugly
it will only make him feel embarrassed
let the little prince believe that his
big nose is perfect
you're right if so our little logan will
be happy forever after
then the king and queen ordered all the
servants to ignore the flaw on logan's
face
they replaced all the pictures in the
palace by the portraits of ones who had
a big and long nose
when logan was a kid he had been taught
about the famous and
beautiful persons the royal heroes all
of them
had long and big noses all of logan's
friends
also had their noses in order to be the
friend of logan
they had to wear fake noses which made
their nose look bigger and longer than
usual
in front of logan everyone always
complimented his long and
big nose logan prince
your nose is so wonderful it's the
standard of beauty
i wish i had a nose like yours
but when logan was out of their sight
they gossiped and made fun of his nose
just like that the prince grew up and he
always proudly thought that his big and
long nose was the standard of beauty
logan had always looked down and
despised people with small
noses small nosed servant
you're just an ugly poor man you will
never be able to serve me
a wonderful prince everything
kept going until one day logan was
introduced to some princesses for
marrying one of them
everyone had a long and big nose they
all met the royal standard
but roger's instinct told him to leave
it aside
until he saw the picture of mia wow a
princess from the neighboring rentford
kingdom
although she had a small nose roger
immediately fell in love with her at
first sight
she had a small nose but that doesn't
matter i love her and accept all of her
imperfections
that's what a real man should do so he
determined to ask for the permission of
his parents to propose to princess mia
this made the king and queen so delicate
i'm not sure whether she will agree to
marry roger or not
and if she agrees then one day she will
probably ridicule his nose
and our son will not be happy anymore
they had not yet decided but the news
about the sudden disappearance of
princess mia had been transmitted to the
palace
logan made up his mind so the king and
the queen had no
choice but to allow logan to go find and
rescue princess
mia this was also the first time logan
went out without the protection of his
parents
he was quickly lost to an abandoned
savannah
logan was exhausted and hungry he
suddenly saw a beautiful house in front
of his eyes
he was so glad that he stepped closer to
the house and knocked on the door
there was a noble old woman with a small
nose welcoming him
hello oh why do your nose look so
strange
it is the biggest nose that i have ever
seen
oh i'm sorry i didn't intend to make fun
of you
but it is really funny
she dared to make fun of my perfect nose
isn't her nose too small ha
if i weren't hungry i would definitely
teach her a lesson
he said madame i am prince logan from
the mezzaland kingdom
and i'm really hungry right now instead
of talking about my nose
i hope you have something for me to eat
oh you are the son of my good friends
the king and the queen of mensa land
come in
son however i still love to talk more
about your nose
maybe you don't know but i'm your
parents close friend
did they tell you anything about a giant
snake however that snake was not as big
as your nose
she is so impolite and she even talks
too much
why doesn't she realize her own
imperfection
yeah her flattering servants have hidden
the truth
made her believe that she is gentle if
that were me i would never be fooled
like that
because i know myself well or to be
exact
i have no flaws the prince would never
think
that he was the one who was being fooled
everyone made fun of him behind his back
like he had done to the old woman
logan this nose really doesn't make you
sad or bother you
every day
madame has anyone told you that you talk
too much
and that you are so rude you have a
small nose
it's ugly my nose is the standard of
beauty
and i'm proud of it
[Music]
thanks for the meal but i cannot stand
it anymore i will leave here and go find
my beloved princess
mia come on son i just want to help you
mia princess are stuck in the crystal
palace
which is not far from here the only way
to rescue her
is that you should kiss on her hand and
then you will probably feel
something a country person with a small
nose like her how can she understand
that a respectable king should have a

anyway she has done a good job when she
showed me the way to rescue mia
on his way logan met a few villagers
they all had small noses they giggled
and pointed to gossip about logan's big
and long
nose look a guy with a creepy giant nose
his nose is even longer than the face of

that's too funny the doubt started to

it's weird the people in this kingdom
all have a small
nose but why do they all look so
confident
logan remembered again all the girls

and he only cared about the beautiful
princess mia with a small
nose but logan had yet to admit that his

he got used to the compliments about his
nose
that's because the people in this
country all have such small noses
they are completely different from the
standards in our country
finally logan reached the crystal palace
it was covered by a garden full of

logan tried to squeeze himself he crept

and vines wrapped around because of an

sometimes logan was stuck the vines
wrapped around his nose
along with the thorns piercing his flesh

does that hurt why can't i slip through
but my nose cannot
was it because was it too big
impossible but because of his love for

logan was still trying to overcome this

he even got a rope made of vine
the prince threw the rope onto the
balcony then clung to it and
began to climb up princess
mia i'm here to rescue you
you are here my prince
don't worry i know how to save you
believe me
but when logan intended to kiss mia's
hand he realized
that his lips couldn't touch her hand
because of his extra big and long
nose this happened so many times
and this was when logan realized that
his nose had been a burden
mia i am sorry but i cannot do it
i have to admit that my nose is too big
i have never been disappointed with it
before
all of the kingdom had hidden the truth
and fooled me that my nose was the
standard of beauty
and all the nobles also had that kind of
nose
i ignored the frank words and assumed
myself
that my nose is truly perfect i also
despised and made fun of people with
small noses
without knowing that it was me who had
been so
funny and pitiful
[Music]
now i have to admit that this nose is
really a flaw of mine
and i have to live with it for the rest
of my life
princess mia i don't deserve to be with
you anymore
anyone who are able to overcome
difficulties to save me will totally be
deserved with my love
right after that an old fairy appeared
beside them
with a kind smile you
you are the woman in the house at the

reminding me of my nose why are you here
logan i am your fairy godmother
you had been cursed and had to live with
this
big nose only when you realized yourself
that it
is your flaw then the curse will be
dissolved
oh my nose now it's getting back to
normal
great my son anyone will have his own
imperfection
and you should realize it and learn how
to accept it
to become a better person then prince
logan was able to kiss princess mia on
the hand
to express his love mia was really happy
and accepted they went back to mexican
and presented the king and the queen
we have been totally wrong for a long
time we shouldn't have covered the truth
and deceived him like that
that was really unfair for him we should

since then logan and mia lived happily
ever after
with a precious lesson that they would

fairy tales
once upon a time in a small house on a

lived the poor couple who earned a

the most valuable thing they had was

the poor family didn't have any children

been

yet
our house feels so empty dear
it really does i only wish we had a

maybe today is not a lucky day for me
